QuestData.Title: The Admiral
QuestData.Description: <Bzzzzzzzzzzzzt.>$B$BI can't believe it...they're almost done rebuilding it! We don't have much time, $n.$B$BAdmiral Ripsnarl, Vanessa's right hand man, is bound to be on board. We'll never get to her if he's still alive to do anything about it. You're going to need to scale the unfinished Juggernaut, find Ripsnarl, and kill him so we can get to Vanessa's private quarters on the top deck.$B$BBe careful, the Admiral bears the worgen curse and would take much pleasure in digging his claws into you!
QuestData.RewardText: <Bzzzzzzzzzzzzt.>$B$BYour exploits have gained quite the following in the intelligence community, $n. Many top members of SI:7 have been earnestly watching you infiltrate the Deadmines through their own Stormwind Communicators.$B$BMathias Shaw himself wants to speak with you! I'll transfer you over momentarily.
